text: Ni jwawisile mwalakwemo yakunyichisya pachanya pakwe (matumbi), ni walipele upile (litakalyo pakuwikapo mesi, m’mela ni inyama), ni jwapimilepo yakulya yakwe (yakwakwanila wakutama palakwepo, jwatesile yalakweyi) m’mowa ncheche gakuliingaana. (Yalakweyi ni yakwanila) kwa akuwusya (ya kagumbidwe ketaka ni yaili palakwepo)
